body_html: @saeta, did you ever look at the gradients. @ankitkv, what did you want it to do? As an aside, you may not want to use a bilinear downsample filter, something like a box area filter (take the destination pixel size and make it into a box that overlaps all pixels on the source image). There's no primitive in tensorflow that does this to my knowledge.

body: @saeta, did you ever look at the gradients. @ankitkv, what did you want it to do? As an aside, you may not want to use a bilinear downsample filter, something like a box area filter (take the destination pixel size and make it into a box that overlaps all pixels on the source image). There's no primitive in tensorflow that does this to my knowledge.
